tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PrescriptiveAnalyticsData (
  id INT,
  source_id INT,
 data_type VARCHAR,
 data_value DECIMAL,
 created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE data_transformations (
    transformation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transformation_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    transformation_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    transformation_script TEXT NOT NULL,
    transformation_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE data_aggregations (
    aggregation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    aggregation_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    aggregation_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    aggregation_function VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    aggregation_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE prescriptive_analytics (
    analytics_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    analytics_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    analytics_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    data_sources_used TEXT NOT NULL,
    transformation_used TEXT NOT NULL,
    aggregation_used TEXT NOT NULL
);
